itemInfo.itemDesc: A lethal plant toxin obtained through Alchemy and used as an ingredient.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by refining Insectivore Plant Sap through Alchemy.

item.name: Insectivore Plant Sap
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Processing an Insectivore Plant Stalk or an Insectivore Plant Root. It can also be Gathered from Insectivore Plants using Bare Hands or a Hoe. Insectivore Plants require a certain level of skill to collect.

item.name: Insectivore Plant Sap
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Processing an Insectivore Plant Stalk or an Insectivore Plant Root. It can also be Gathered from Insectivore Plants using Bare Hands or a Hoe. Insectivore Plants require a certain level of skill to collect.

item.name: Amanita Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking.
- How to Obtain: Amanita Mushrooms can be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!
